name: Pybond
description:
You are a solo adventurer seeking riches and fame in the farthest depths of the unknown. Along your adventure you will fight off wolfs, bandits, and mythical creatures in the quest to go ever farther. Be careful as you only have one life. Sacrifice your experience to unlock further discovery and become the first to feast your eyes at the true end.

It is suggested to play with the number pad.

To Play:

1) download zip file

2) run PybondV_.exe
